suggestedTexts: {'subtitle': 'Cerca Tejera, Colmenar Viejo', 'title': 'Terraced house in Calle Margarita Sala no number'}
description: Discover our 22 exclusive single-family homes in Colmenar Viejo, each with 4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, perfectly designed for comfort and elegance. With surfaces that vary between 286m2 and 331m2, these homes are distributed in basement, ground floor and upper floor. Enjoy a solarium ranging between 60 and 75m2 on the roof, where the panoramic views of the regional park of the upper Manzanares basin will take your breath away. Committed to sustainability and energy efficiency, we have incorporated: - Underfloor heating-cooling through individualized aerothermal energy. - 2KwP photovoltaic panels. - SATE insulation on facades for maximum thermal comfort. - Glass with solar control and low emissive treatment, integrated into aluminum carpentry with thermal bridge breakage. Personalize your home with options at no additional cost in: - Paint. - Kitchen furniture and countertop. - Flooring and tiling in bathrooms. - Sky Niessen mechanisms in five different finishes, with the freedom to choose their location in the home. Additionally, each home is equipped with an armored door, a home automation system for individual control of aerothermal heat per room, air conditioning in the living room, furniture and mirrors in the bathrooms on the first floor, LED lighting in the bedroom closets and many other details. quality. We invite you to contact us and discover everything these homes have to offer you.

description: CRUZ&ASOCIADOS SELLS Spacious corner semi-detached house in the El Olivar area. Housing located within a small urbanization with green areas and a community pool. The house has a front patio, which is larger than the rest of the homes in the urbanization as it is on the corner and has a small backyard. Very bright house as it is on the corner. It is distributed on an entrance floor that is accessed from the front patio with a guest toilet, a kitchen furnished with high and low furniture, a pantry area and a living-dining room with access to the backyard. First floor with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, master bedroom suite with bathroom with bathtub, while the other two bedrooms share a bathroom and a terrace of about ten meters. Each bedroom has its built-in wardrobe, with the master bedroom wardrobe having three sections. Attic floor with bedroom with built-in wardrobe, bathroom with bathtub, office area and access to a terrace of about 6 meters from which you have views over Madrid capital. Finally, in the basement there is a second living room with a corner bar area, fireplace, games area, clothesline and laundry room and a large garage for two cars. The house needs updating. Negotiable price! Located in one of the most comfortable areas of Colmenar, with all kinds of services, school, bus stop, large supermarkets, health center, etc.

suggestedTexts: {'subtitle': 'San Crispín - La Estación Consorcio, Colmenar Viejo', 'title': 'Semi-detached house in Pedro Lázaro'}
description: Magnificent semi-detached house for sale in Colmenar Viejo, El Mirador de Madrid.Located in an exclusive gated community, this property offers a lifestyle of luxury and comfort.With common areas that include a swimming pool, green area and gym, you can enjoy moments of relaxation and fun in your own home. The house has three floors, offering large spaces for the whole family.On the ground floor, you will find a hall that will welcome you to a bright 40m2 living-dining room, perfect for meetings and celebrations.The modern American kitchen will allow you to prepare delicious meals while interacting with your guests.In addition, you can enjoy a terrace and a large garden, ideal for sunbathing or enjoying a barbecue. On the first floor, you will find three large bedrooms, all with multiple built-in wardrobes for additional storage.Two full bathrooms, one of them en suite, will provide you with comfort and privacy.One of the bedrooms also has a 7m2 terrace, where you can relax and enjoy the views. The third floor will surprise you with a large bedroom and a full bathroom.In addition, you will have two large terraces of 28m2 and 15m2, where you can enjoy the panoramic views and create your own outdoor spaces. The property has pre-installation of air conditioning, underfloor heating and solar panels for sanitary water, providing you with greater comfort and energy efficiency. Located in an area that is rapidly growing, this chalet is surrounded by nature and has nearby services such as schools, health centers and supermarkets.In addition, you will be just 5 minutes from the Ventanal de la Sierra Shopping Center, where you will find a wide range of shops, restaurants and entertainment. Colmenar Viejo is a municipality with a charming historic center, where you can enjoy the monumental Church of the Assumption and discover its history related to El Real de Manzanares and the Mendoza family.With constant development since the 19th century, this municipality has experienced an increase in population, service sector and construction, which has led to an increase in urban architecture and the construction of new homes and second homes. Don't miss the opportunity to acquire this magnificent semi-detached house in a privileged location.With 259 m² built, 4 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, terrace, balcony, built-in wardrobes, storage room, access adapted for people with reduced mobility and garage space, this property is perfect for those looking for quality, comfort and an exclusive lifestyle.Contact us now for more information!

suggestedTexts: {'subtitle': 'San Crispín - La Estación Consorcio, Colmenar Viejo', 'title': 'Semi-detached house in Pedro Lázaro'}
description: Welcome to luxury and comfort in Colmenar Viejo! Gilmar Consulting exclusively offers this magnificent semi-detached house for sale located in Colmenar Viejo "El Mirador de Madrid", within an exclusive gated community that offers a dream lifestyle. The common areas include a swimming pool, green area and a gym so you can enjoy your leisure moments to the fullest. The house has three floors, offering large spaces for the whole family. On the ground floor, you will find a hall that will welcome you to a bright 40m2 living-dining room, perfect for meetings and celebrations, and a separate kitchen. In addition, you can enjoy a terrace and a lush garden. On the first floor, you will find three large bedrooms, all with multiple built-in wardrobes for additional storage. Two full bathrooms, one of them en suite, will provide you with comfort and privacy. The third floor will surprise you with a 56m2 terrace to enjoy the panoramic views and create your own outdoor spaces. The area in which this chalet is located is in full growth and surrounded by nature. In addition, you will find nearby services such as schools, health centers and supermarkets. Just 5 minutes from the Ventanal de la Sierra Shopping Center, you will have everything you need at your fingertips. The historic center of Colmenar Viejo is charming, with the monumental Church of the Assumption and a history related to El Real de Manzanares and the Mendoza family. Since the 19th century, the population of Colmenar Viejo has been increasing, as has the service and construction sector. Urban architecture is constantly growing and many people have chosen this area to have their second residence. Don't miss the opportunity to have your own little piece of paradise in a prime location! Contact us for more information.

description: EXCLUSIVE SALE WITH COLMENAR VIEJO HOMES Unique opportunity! A spectacular INDEPENDENT villa is for sale in the privileged location of Colmenar Viejo. The residence, has 232 square meters built on an extensive 500 square meter plot, is distinguished by its exceptional construction quality and captivating luminosity. The distribution of this dream house unfolds on three levels: On the main floor, you are welcomed by a huge living room with direct access to the lush garden, a completely renovated kitchen with an office area, a cozy service room and an elegant bathroom. The garage is also located here, a space that adds comfort and practicality to your daily life. On the first floor, the master bedroom is presented as an oasis of tranquility with its own en-suite bathroom, accompanied by two additional bedrooms and another bathroom that provide a touch of elegance and comfort. description: B2V InmobiliariA sells EXCLUSIVELY Pablo Batres Enrique Vallinas Lázaro Apartment in Colmenar Viejo in perfect condition, ready to move into. Exceptional location very close to shopping galleries, Mercadona, schools, clinic... 136 m2 apartment with 80 m2 terrace Housing distribution: - Comfortable and spacious entrance hall -Large living room with terrace -Furnished kitchen -4 bedrooms, two of them have access to the rear terrace and one of them with a suite-type bathroom. -2 full bathrooms Large terrace of 80 m2 with a wooden shed for leisure, storage or whatever use you want to give it. The house is heated by piped community gas with an independent meter and has some hot/cold pump devices in some rooms. PVC and double glazed windows OLD APILE Education Tirso de Molina bilingual school In Colmenar Viejo there are four public nursery schools and one children's home (five public and eleven private), nine public preschool and primary schools, three secondary education institutes and two private-concerted schools. Health It has two health centers, one in the north and one in the south of the city.A non-medicated municipal ambulance allows urgent transfers to the capital.There is a Red Cross post staffed by volunteers, which has an ambulance. The main access roads to the town are: M-607 MadridTres Cantos Colmenar Viejo CercedaNavacerrada M-609 Colmenar Viejocircumvent Soto del RealCross with M-611 M-618 TorrelodonesHoyo de Manzanares Colmenar ViejoCrossroads with M-607 M-625 Colmenar ViejoGuadalix de la SierraCrossroads with M-631 M-104 San Agustín de GuadalixColmenar Viejo Buses Urban Two urban bus lines that run through the town and connect the town center with the Train Station: L-1 • Las Adelfillas – FF Station.DC. L-2 • Av.Remedies – FF Station.DC. Interurban There are several intercity bus lines that connect Colmenar Viejo with Madrid and neighboring towns: 610 • Torrelodones – Hoyo de Manzanares – Colmenar Viejo SE720 • Colmenar Viejo - Manzanares el Real 720 • Colmenar Viejo – Collado Villalba 721 • Colmenar Viejo (along Avenida de la Libertad) – Madrid 722 • Colmenar Viejo (on the West Ring Road) – Madrid 723 • Colmenar Viejo – Tres Cantos 724 • Madrid – Manzanares el Real – El Boalo. 725 • Madrid – Miraflores – Bustarviejo – Valdemanco 726 • Madrid – Guadalix de la Sierra – Navalafuente 727 • Colmenar Viejo – San Agustín del Guadalix N702 • Madrid – Colmenar Viejo (night bus) Railway Colmenar Viejo Station (Cercanías C4.svg Cercanías Madrid): trains every 20 minutes on line C4 that connect the municipality with: Three Cantos: 8 min. The Gourmand: 12 min. Cantoblanco University (Autonomous University of Madrid): 15 min. Madrid-Chamartín Station: 25 min.Schedules of line C-4. For more information or to visit, please get in touch. Pablo Batres Enrique Vallinas Lázaro B2V InmobiliariA, your reference real estate agency in the mountains of Madrid and surrounding areas.

description: ATANCE sells this charming apartment located in the coveted "El Vivero" urbanization, one of the most sought after in Colmenar Viejo, located in the northern area of ​​the municipality.With a generous surface area of ​​123 square meters, this home offers a comfortable and well-distributed space. Upon entering, you are welcomed by an elegant entrance hall that leads to a spacious living room with two rooms, providing a cozy and versatile atmosphere.From the living room, there is access to a south-facing terrace, providing unbeatable views and a bright and pleasant atmosphere. The fully furnished kitchen is a perfect place to enjoy your culinary skills, and also has a terrace that offers views of the common areas of the development, adding a touch of serenity to the surroundings. The home has 4 bedrooms, providing more than enough space to adapt to family needs.In addition, it has 2 full bathrooms, ensuring comfort and privacy for all residents. suggestedTexts: {'subtitle': 'San Andrés, Colmenar Viejo', 'title': 'Terraced house'}
description: EXCLUSIVAS ARAGON, Real Estate Agency since 1978 (Registered in the Professional Registry of Real Estate Agents of the CAM with number 371/19) offers you this interesting single-family home for sale in Colmenar Viejo (Madrid): It is a semi-detached building, built on four floors on a plot of about 148m2. The building, which totals about 234m2, is distributed: On the ground floor, with road access from the street and access via the internal staircase, is the garage with capacity for 2 cars, with automatic doors.On this floor there is a room with a window to the front patio and a large storage room with a window to the backyard, this patio is covered.From this floor you can access the rest of the house via the internal staircase; The main floor is accessed from the street through a spacious front patio, with awnings, via a staircase that leads to the distributor hall, with a built-in wardrobe.On this floor is the living room with access to a large terrace of about 15m2., with awnings.A bathroom with shower, and a spacious kitchen facing the front patio. The first floor is distributed in three large rooms, one of which is used as a master bedroom with a dressing room and bathroom.On this same floor there is another full bathroom with a jacuzzi bathtub. The upper floor, with sloping ceilings covered in wood, has a spacious living room, office or study, with Velux-type windows. Highlights among its qualities and facilities: parquet and ceramic floors; The walls painted in gotelé in light colors, and tiling in the kitchen and bathrooms; The interior carpentry is made of oak, and the exterior carpentry is made of white aluminum with climalit glass and blinds. Among other more relevant elements and facilities, we must highlight the large lined built-in wardrobes, heating and hot water by a mixed natural gas boiler, heat and cold pumps, and its three pleasant patios, one of them glazed. The house is located in the San Andres - El Portachuelo area, close to said Shopping Center.Also close to schools, nurseries, institutes, sports areas and facilities, pharmacy and public leisure spaces.Close access to the ring road and the M-607.Regarding transport and communications, it is worth highlighting the proximity to the urban and interurban bus stops and the suburban station. The town of Colmenar Viejo has a commuter train and proper road communication with the towns in the mountains, Tres Cantos and the city of Madrid. The indicated sales price does not include taxes or deed expenses.Consult us in this regard. EXCLUSIVES ARAGÓN DOES NOT CHARGE COMMISSION TO BUYERS.

suggestedTexts: {'subtitle': 'El Olivar - La Magdalena, Colmenar Viejo', 'title': 'Terraced house'}
description: In Colmenar Viejo, a privileged enclave at the foot of the Sierra de Guadarrama, this wonderful villa is available for sale. It is a semi-detached single-family home of 230 meters built and 184 useful square meters, located on a 112-meter plot distributed as follows: GROUND FLOOR which we enter through a glass access porch, arriving at the entrance hall that connects with: - A bright kitchen with an office and two doors, one with access from the hall and another direct to the living room - A spacious living-dining room with fireplace and air conditioning, and with direct access from a large window to the patio/garden located at the back of the house - And a courtesy toilet FIRST FLOOR is the rest area and throughout this floor the floor is herringbone parquet. There are several rooms here: - A very large master bedroom to which the current owners gave more space by joining two bedrooms. It has an en-suite bathroom with a bathtub and bidet, and two built-in wardrobes. - Two bedrooms with built-in wardrobe and one of them with split air conditioning and heat pump - And a bathroom with a shower tray GROUND FLOOR COVERED/Attic with 60 open-plan square meters, where you can create a reading, work or play space for children. BASEMENT Where is the garage with automatic door and capacity to store two vehicles. Something tremendously comfortable is access from inside the house and in addition, this room has a window that overlooks the backyard, which provides ventilation and natural light.
